properties.title: Modern Apartment
properties.description: Spacious 2-bedroom apartment with ocean view. Recently renovated with modern appliances and a large balcony perfect for entertaining.

properties.title: Downtown Loft
properties.description: Industrial-style loft in the heart of Manhattan. High ceilings, exposed brick walls, and walking distance to subway stations.

properties.title: Beach House
properties.description: Stunning beachfront property with direct access to the sand. 4 bedrooms, infinity pool, and breathtaking sunset views.

properties.title: Cozy Studio
properties.description: Perfect starter apartment near universities. Compact yet functional design with all utilities included in rent.

properties.title: Luxury Penthouse
properties.description: Top-floor penthouse with panoramic city views. Private elevator, rooftop terrace, and state-of-the-art smart home system.

properties.title: Family Home
properties.description: Spacious 3-bedroom house with large backyard. Great neighborhood with excellent schools and parks nearby.

properties.title: Urban Condo
properties.description: Modern condo in tech district. Building amenities include gym, co-working space, and rooftop lounge.

properties.title: Historic Townhouse
properties.description: Charming 19th-century townhouse with original hardwood floors. Beautifully restored while maintaining period features.

properties.title: Mountain Cabin
properties.description: Rustic cabin with mountain views. Ideal for nature lovers, featuring a fireplace and access to hiking trails.

properties.title: Waterfront Condo
properties.description: Luxury waterfront living with marina access. Floor-to-ceiling windows and private boat slip included.

properties.title: Garden Apartment
properties.description: Ground-floor apartment with private garden space. Pet-friendly community in a quiet residential area.

properties.title: Tech District Studio
properties.description: Efficient studio in the heart of SOMA. Walking distance to tech companies and public transportation.

properties.title: Suburban House
properties.description: Comfortable 3-bedroom house in a family-friendly suburb. Large yard, garage, and close to schools.

properties.title: City Center Apartment
properties.description: Contemporary apartment in downtown LA. Access to rooftop pool, fitness center, and trendy restaurants.

properties.title: Chic Loft
properties.description: Stylish loft with open floor plan and modern finishes. Located in a vibrant neighborhood with nightlife and culture.

properties.title: Eco-Friendly Apartment
properties.description: Sustainable living in a green-certified building. Solar panels, energy-efficient appliances, and community garden.

properties.title: Luxury Villa
properties.description: Exquisite villa with private pool and beach access. High-end finishes, spacious layout, and stunning ocean views.

properties.title: Compact City Apartment
properties.description: Efficiently designed apartment in the city center. Perfect for singles or couples looking for urban convenience.

properties.title: Riverside Condo
properties.description: Beautiful condo with river views. Modern amenities, secure parking, and close to downtown attractions.

properties.title: Vintage Apartment
properties.description: Character-filled apartment with vintage charm. High ceilings, large windows, and located in a historic district.

properties.title: Sunny Apartment
properties.description: Bright and airy apartment with large windows. Close to beaches, parks, and vibrant nightlife.

properties.title: Contemporary Condo
properties.description: Sleek condo with modern design elements. Access to rooftop pool, fitness center, and communal lounge.

properties.title: Charming Bungalow
properties.description: Cozy bungalow with a front porch and garden. Located in a quiet neighborhood with easy access to downtown.

properties.title: High-Rise Apartment
properties.description: Luxury high-rise living with stunning city views. Full-service building with concierge, gym, and rooftop terrace.

properties.title: Spacious Duplex
properties.description: Large duplex with private entrance and garage. Ideal for families or roommates looking for extra space.
